tool.name: Extract partitions
tool.description: Separate sequences that are annotated with partitions into grouped files
tool.command: mkdir -p output && cd output && @BINARY@ --max-size $max_size --min-partition-size $min_partition_size $output_unassigned output #for input in $inputs $input #end for

param.name: max_size
param.label: Max group size
param.help: No more than this many number of sequences will be stored in each output (--max-size/-X)

param.name: min_partition_size
param.label: Min partition size
param.help: The minimum partition size worth keeping (--min-partition-size/-m)

tool.help:
Separate sequences that are annotated with partitions into grouped files.
@HELP_FOOTER@
